title: Introducing 'The Witness: In His Own Words'
itunes:title: Introducing 'The Witness: In His Own Words'
itunes:subtitle: In 2005, Joseph O'Callaghan's testimony helped convict two drug-dealing gangsters for murder, and he became the youngest person ever to enter the Witness Protection Programme in Ireland.Now, as the men he put away agitate for release, he t...
description:
In 2005, Joseph O'Callaghan's testimony helped convict two drug-dealing gangsters for murder, and he became the youngest person ever to enter the Witness Protection Programme in Ireland.


Now, as the men he put away agitate for release, he tells his extraordinary life story in his own words for the first time.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
